name: Moist Banana Bread
instructions: In a mixing bowl, mash bananas with a fork
Stir melted butter into mashed bananas
Mix in sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract
Sprinkle baking soda and salt over the mixture and stir
Add flour and mix until just incorporated (don't overmix)
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake for 60-65 minutes until toothpick comes out clean
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire rack
notes: Use very ripe bananas with brown spots for best flavor. Bread can be wrapped tightly and frozen for up to 3 months.
